descriptions: Added Focus Mode — when holding ALT, you can now focus/unfocus to freely move your camera.
When an animation is playing in the header and you are in the menu, a new “Edit Position” button now appears, automatically triggering /animpos so you no longer need to type the command manually.
Added a quick “X” button in the search input to instantly clear your previous search.
Search terms are now cached when closing the menu, so your last search remains when reopening.
The /e command now supports animations typed in both uppercase and lowercase.
Fixed an issue where removing binds wouldn’t properly delete the assigned bind.
Fixed a bug where, if a music animation was used inside a sequence, the animation after the music animation would not play.
